and these are the Isis fighters who the

Prime Minister Nouri al-maliki who's

not every setback was a defeat those who

Regular Army fight Isis and their

volunteered and are waiting to be sent
to fight mud sir says that even if his

no no we don't fear on or any other

we don't want to rely on strangers
everyone here seems nervous now unless

John Simpson BBC news Karbala
